definition: to inspect/to review/to read/to peruse/to go through/to experience

sentences.english: No words can express the grandeur of that parade.
sentences.chinese: 閱兵式那宏偉的場面是無法用語言來表達的。

sentences.english: The men filed onto the parade ground and passed the general.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們排成單行進入閱兵場從將軍面前走過。

sentences.english: In the national day parade square foot teams, women militiamen last appearance.
sentences.chinese: 在國慶閱兵徒步方隊中，女民兵方隊最後一個亮相。

sentences.english: At the beginning of a ceremonial parade,he gives the order to march on.
sentences.chinese: 閱兵儀式開始時，他下令部隊進場。

sentences.english: China to unveil new nuclear-capable intercontinental missiles on National Day.
sentences.chinese: 閱兵典禮將展示中國新型核武洲際導彈。

sentences.english: Parade display of might 'not a threat'.
sentences.chinese: 國慶大閱兵不會對任何國家構成威脅。

sentences.english: A military parade down the main street of Phoenix, Ariz. , ca.
sentences.chinese: 阿下來的鳳凰城，亞利桑那州，加州主要街道閱兵式。

sentences.english: The military inspection ends in a flash, but I am still lost in the scene.
sentences.chinese: 閱兵一晃就結束了，但我意猶未盡。

sentences.english: Kim Jong Il attended a military parade to mark the 65th birthday of Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
sentences.chinese: 金正日出席閱兵式，紀念朝鮮勞動黨65歲生日。

sentences.english: Troops in the parade behind the hold the line, is the Band drum sing.
sentences.chinese: 在閱兵部隊後面壓陣的，是鼓樂齊鳴的軍樂團。

sentences.english: The troops drew up on the parade ground.
According to eyewitnesses, the crash occurred immediately after the parade.
sentences.chinese: 據目擊者說，飛機墜毀後閱兵仍在繼續。

sentences.english: A band preceded the soldiers in the parade.
sentences.chinese: 在閱兵行列中一支樂隊走在士兵的前面。

sentences.english: A "parade village" for the troops to live in is currently under construction, said Fang.
sentences.chinese: 據悉，閱兵村的建設也在進行之中。

sentences.english: It is the first time female guards of honor will join a parade.
sentences.chinese: 本次閱兵，儀仗隊中將首次出現女性面孔。

sentences.english: Gun salute as the resounding sound of the National Day, China's military parade ceremony began.
sentences.chinese: 隨着六十聲國慶禮炮響徹雲霄，中國閱兵儀式開始。

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Jie3 fang4 jun1

definition: Xi'an Incident of 12th December 1936 (kidnap of Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石[Jiang3 Jie4 shi2])
